column3:
“Lavender Jones. Tread with ease. Read on (newcomers: see note about paranoia)

I bought this at the advice of my budtender at Altitude Littleton. I requested something that's good for stimulating the creative juices, and he suggested this. Buds are fuzzy and dense with a nice purple hue to them. Pleasant scent of lavender, pine, with a hint of oak. It does not have a skunky or kushy smell to it, and the scent profile...”
“Holy God this strain is potent! Got a half O from the disp today and only smoked 2 bowls, now im having the greatest experience of my life! Smoke this tree!”

“I have been curious about this strain. mostly because it's parent is Casey Jones, a strain I've never had. 
I picked up a half gram of crumble by Canamo and it tests at 71%THC last night. I did a dab when I got home to try it out of course, it didn't stand out because I had been smoking all day.
  It's the 1st thing I've dabbed today and woohoo I have a lot of energy & I just feel depression melting away.  I noticed ...”

“Highly recommend for indica users looking for a daily strain.

I’m an indica fan due to bad stress/anxiety issues and try to stay away from sativas but dabble in hybrids when looking for a day-to-day type of strain. Lavender Jones has to be one of the best daily strains to smoke. Within 5-10 mins you feel an intense heightening of senses as the the sativa starts to hit and mellows out within the next 10 minutes to a ...”

“This was the strain I wanted when I wanted to savor my food and bake desserts. Something about this strain makes good taste so much better. 
It had a light, delicate herbaceous flavor. It reminded me of melon and herbs, with floral elements. I smoked this one before I bought my herbal vaporizer and definitely need to give it a shot now. 

Unlike some people this didn't cause my anxiety to ramp up so I think I got luc...”

“Peak: felt super relaxed and happy. Super talkative and just feeling real head high.

Mids: still really head high. thought a lot. lasted quite a while than most strains.

Crash: still head high but felt a good body high. legs felt numb along with my head. my head high felt like flying." dreams were intensified and heavy sleeping.”"

“Personally I was not crazy about this strain in the slightest. I was suggested it when I told the man running the counter that I needed something for anxiety and adhd but have it keep me focused. I smoked it when I got home and almost instantly my anxiety was heightened and caused me to experience a panic attack.”

“I have to say this is very heavy stuff! Picked this up from a new dispensary about 1.5 grams Pretty green nuggets very light orange hairs some purple in the nuggets kind of perfume and chemical smell. The structure is dense I would say that anything crossed with the lineage of purple urkle I just have a very nauseous feeling if I do too much, however if I were doing any other strain except Mexican sativa lineage eith...”

“I have to say this is very heavy stuff! Picked this up from a new dispensary about 1.5 grams Pretty green nuggets very light orange hairs some purple in the nuggets kind of perfume and chemical smell. The structure is dense I would say that anything crossed with the lineage of purple urkle I just have a very nauseous feeling if I do too much, however if I were doing any other strain except Mexican sativa lineage eith...”

“It has a very spicy, herbal, flowery taste to it.  In my opinion, I do appreciate the taste, but sometimes the flavor will turn on you when rolled up.  The flavor holds up well in a vaporizer or a pipe with a small bowl.  If you like a spicy tasting herb, then you won't mind this, if that's not really your thing then take a pass on this strain.  I mean what I purchased was labeled Purple Jones"  & I was thinking tha...”"

“I went to my dispensary and they had a great deal on this so I gave it a try and  very happy I did. I actually went it for some Sour Diesel but they were out and the bud tender told me this would be similar. Well, it’s not  at all LOL but it’s still a very  nice strain. There is a pretty quick onset of relaxation, and then I just felt happy and smiley. Pains gone. It’s not exactly energizing, but I’m not couch locked...”

“3.5 / 5 for me. Strain was different than expected. Thought it would have a sweeter taste and smell, but it lives true to its name of Lavender. Being that I’m not a big fan of the floral flavor, I enjoy more pungent flavors, the smoke isn’t that great. The high however is pretty good. Initial dreamy cerebral effects that follow with nice overall body effects. Was looking for an indica for night but this is def a hybr...”
“Literally changed my life. One minute I'm me, the next I'm The Hunchback of Notre Dame.”

“The strain Lavender Jones is incredible for pain and anxiety. I was able to eat, rest well, and enjoy a nice evening despite hip pain. This easily made my top 5 for pain relief. Not harsh on the lungs, and has a pleasant aroma. The rich purple coloring is delightful to observe when breaking up, all in all this is a well rounded strain. Visually appealing and ideal for pain relief.”
“It tastes great and it makes me feel just great with the chronic pain, and PTSD right away.”

“A friend brought 5 clones to grow at home and it turned out awesome. Super smooth, earthy and very potent. I was able to get a Mother plant started of this strain and absolutley love it. Easy to grow, big yields and a pleasure to smoke. Does well by pruning and topping early. I turned a few friends onto it and I am getting abused by requests for clones from my mother now.  If you can get some, try it. You won't regre...”

“A friend brought 5 clones to grow at home and it turned out awesome. Super smooth, earthy and very potent. I was able to get a Mother plant started of this strain and absolutley love it. Easy to grow, big yields and a pleasure to smoke. Does well by pruning and topping early. I turned a few friends onto it and I am getting abused by requests for clones from my mother now.  If you can get some, try it. You won't regre...”
“Great strain. Smell hints of orange, citrus, and lavender. Effects are very mellow, tranquil, and relaxed. Ideal strain for early evening after a long and busy day,”

“Although testing at just over 18% Thc, Lavender Jones has heavy-hitting psychoactive effects as well as a manageable body high. A fair hybrid, the high will be stimulating enough to keep the mind engaged and present. The overall experience was sharply euphoric and comfortable all around.”
“Incredible for pain and anxiety.”
“Definitely one of my new favorite strains. It relaxes you and keeps your mind away. I smoke Lavender Jones before work and it gets rid of my pain and keeps me focus. A must try for sure.”

“This is a perfect strain for anyone who wants a functioning Indica for during the day.  I like to smoke this strain before I go do anything throughout my day. Day off or at work Lavender Jones will have you feeling relaxed yet focused.”
“Very nice flavor profile and body effects. I just used a tens unit on my neck/shoulders for the muscle spasms, then vaped a bowl of this in the Mighty vape. WOW! I feel amazing!!”

“Made me feel very relaxed and uplifted. Great pain relieving properties. There was very low THC (barely 1% if I recall) but very high THCa (almost 22%!!). Also, this bus reeks of lavender as one might suspect. They don't call it Lavender Jones for no reason.”
“Love this strain. Puts me in such a relaxed chill mode and makes my thoughts happy. Details on this strain describe it perfectly. Great taste. My new favorite for sure.”

“Made me feel very relaxed and uplifted. Great pain relieving properties. There was very low THC (barely 1% if I recall) but very high THCa (almost 22%!!). Also, this bus reeks of lavender as one might suspect. They don't call it Lavender Jones for no reason.”

“Hello Lavender Jones, I have some feelings for you. While your Purple Urkle parent is apparent (haha I rhymed) but your Casey Jones parent has me very intrigued I'll have to try some on it's own when I come across it.
  The taste is sweet& earthy. The high is euphoric it makes me talkative while having a nice body buzz.
This strain over all pretty good it doesn't have a very distinguishing buzz, it's not something yo...”

“At the dispensary they had this listed as an indica. Although it definitely has indica dominance, it's definitely a hybrid. Starts odd with almost a very faint blueberry taste with a little floral. The cerebral effect is very nice but not too intense. The physical stone is stronger than the cerebral but not overwhelming. Overall, this is a great strain if you're looking for something nice all around or if you need to...”
“LOVE IT. if you want to just enjoy your day and chill... this is the one.”
“Definitely one of my new favorite strains. It relaxes you and keeps your mind away. I smoke Lavender Jones before work and it gets rid of my pain and keeps me focus. A must try for sure.”

“This is a perfect strain for anyone who wants a functioning Indica for during the day.  I like to smoke this strain before I go do anything throughout my day. Day off or at work Lavender Jones will have you feeling relaxed yet focused.”

“This bud is amazing! The aroma is strong lavender, with a hint of oak. The smoke is smooth and is not harsh at all. Definitley one of the stronger strains ive had, as this one put me to the couch for awhile, then you get the body waves. Great all around.”
“Love this strain. Puts me in such a relaxed chill mode and makes my thoughts happy. Details on this strain describe it perfectly. Great taste. My new favorite for sure.”

“This is a perfect strain for anyone who wants a functioning Indica for during the day.  I like to smoke this strain before I go do anything throughout my day. Day off or at work Lavender Jones will have you feeling relaxed yet focused.”
“LOVE IT. if you want to just enjoy your day and chill... this is the one.”

“This bud is amazing! The aroma is strong lavender, with a hint of oak. The smoke is smooth and is not harsh at all. Definitley one of the stronger strains ive had, as this one put me to the couch for awhile, then you get the body waves. Great all around.”

“VERY laid back, mellow strain. No worries what so ever. Also it has 0 couch lock. Unique taste. Lavender / soapish taste. It's different. Very clear headed, uplifting sativa like high but 0 paranoia and complete relaxation mentally like an indica. Interesting Hybrid. I would get this again.”

“Fragrant, beautiful tight buds. But buyer beware: as other reviewers have noted, this is NOT a good strain if you have anxiety or are otherwise prone to anxiety/paranoia. I smoked this last night and it exacerbated my anxiety so much that I was literally afraid to fall asleep because of nightmares. I was worried about people breaking into my house. Not good times. 

If you don't have chronic/severe anxiety or a histo...”
“Beautiful buds, incredible smell and taste... definitely one of my favorites.  Helps with my pain, and inflammation associated with crohns.  Bought a 1/2,,and I’m loving it.”
“Good looking buds, really dense.  Very indica like effects, relaxed, dreamy, tired.  Chem taste with some flowery overtones.  Solid indica leaning hybrid with good potency.”

“This strain is my jam. I’m all about the body relaxation. The terps in this make for a great night cap. 

Good for insomnia and pain. Definite couch-lock. Much more indica than sativa.”

“Actually, love the taste. Tastes as advertised. I've never had Casey Jones before so I was anxious to give this hybrid a try. I'm happy I did. Not a heavy hitter yet still nice. No anxiety and no pain. Will buy again and recommend”
“Terrific sativa high that leaves me feeling energetic and hungry. Would definitely get this one again.”
“One of the best tasting strains ever”
“Very slight taste of berries when smoking.  Grown by Flora Vega and bought on sale for $35 eighth.”
“Gets  me super high and then knocks me out.”

“First Impression: Smooth, Floral Taste

Final Impression: This is what you need when you think you don't need it. Hard day at work? Stressed? Lavender Jones is what you need. It will put you down but not out. Great for zoning out and clearing anything on your mind with slight euphoria”
“Smoking it right now, smells fruity and taste fruity 👅 Inside grown I’m guessing”
“One of my favorite strains. High was very mellow with a little bit of the giggles.  Buds are very dense and furry.”
“Gets  me super high and then knocks me out.”
“Absolutely love this strain, nice dense and colorful buds, very potent, and the aromas are amazing. All around good high”

“First Impression: Smooth, Floral Taste

Final Impression: This is what you need when you think you don't need it. Hard day at work? Stressed? Lavender Jones is what you need. It will put you down but not out. Great for zoning out and clearing anything on your mind with slight euphoria”

“This strain has a strong scent of tangerines and pine. The buds are so dense that you may find it difficult to get trimmers inside. It is one of those strains that is very easy to trim. You can shear the buds easily.”
“Smoking it right now, smells fruity and taste fruity 👅 Inside grown I’m guessing”

“Before trying this strain, I had only 2 favorites out of all the strains I've tried. Now I have 3! It gives my body a wonderful relaxing, chill as hell feeling but I have to be careful not to over indulge or else I get all panicky/ anxious. I'm always high when I wake up, which is cool if I don't have anything to do the next day. Other than that, I'm rockin with it!”

“I get my Lavender Jones from The Pig N Whistle  in Denver and I love it! Their's is definitely heavy on the Purple Urkle cause it is very relaxing, but lacks the couch lock of a full indica. Wonderful daytime medication for anxiety or winding down at the end of the night! It has the most wonderful floral lavender-y taste.”
“The best i've  had so far”
“Harsh smoke, rough on throat. Left dry nasty taste in mouth.”

“great smoke smooth hits and amazing if you mix with blue dream. I'm a heavy smoker 2 ounces a week and that mix up will bust my head every time. I call it the mixie wixie but its a really relaxed talkitive high no dry mouth for me. love it”
“Currently visiting Denver Colorado and picked up this strain from Native Roots Dispensary. 5 stars at best. Has my face melted while kicking in bits of energy. Oiiii miiii goiiiii!!!”

“Man, picked some of this up yesterday and the smell is fantastic but unfortunately the same cannot be said for the taste. You get more of the pungy part when it burns but the effects are primo.  Great for anything passed 5pm with high levels of functionality. 💪👍🏼”
“Wow! Pure euphoria & giggles; what not to like! It gives you a sense of lavender hence the name.”

“I picked up a gram grown by Flora Vega. The first thing I noticed is how light the taste is. Some people like thick pungent strains, this is not it. I think it would be a great strain for first time users that have never smoked before. Less chances for coughing fits.
The initial head change wore off after 30 min and then wore off completely after 2 hours. Great for evening time strain.”
“I got this in canna sap to vape in my N-pen. This is a nice relaxed yet happy fun like high.  I'm really digging it!”

“Super smooth to smoke and has a great taste. Colors of purple and dark green as in description. Nice high; relaxing, euphoric, pain relieving, and makes my psychological pain go away. One of my favorites!”
“What a sweet and delicious treat! My new favorite strain!”
“love everything about this strain....the high, the flavor and smell is amazing”
“Great relaxing, cerebral high. Body is relaxed, stressless and painfree.  Perfect for bedtime.”
“Smoking it right now, smells fruity and taste fruity 👅 Inside grown I’m guessing”

“Lavender Jones.... just saying the name make me feel calm ☺

This strain is a very beautiful strain with deep purple and green hues. The smoke is very tasty and upon exhale, it is really smooth. I prefered smoking from my Vape and or my pipe lol I HONESTLY loved the taste and the high is relaxing and calm. It eased my anxiety to nothing and you do feel a slight head high behind your eyes but you can also feel the bod...”

“A perfect blend hybrid. The sativa effects are noticeable and immediate, while the indica continues the high for a while after. Left me feeling relaxed but focused. Smoked about 1g in a dry herb vaporizer and took my dogs for a walk. Was able to enjoy the outdoors and still stay focused enough to keep the dogs in check. 
Possibly my favorite hybrid so far since acquiring my MMJ card.”
“Very slight taste of berries when smoking.  Grown by Flora Vega and bought on sale for $35 eighth.”

“Actually, love the taste. Tastes as advertised. I've never had Casey Jones before so I was anxious to give this hybrid a try. I'm happy I did. Not a heavy hitter yet still nice. No anxiety and no pain. Will buy again and recommend”

“• when sourced top shelf, you can taste those lavender essential notes along with a smooth creamy cloud • stress, aches, and spasms are eased with 1 mild dose • overall relaxed feeling putting you only slightly in the couch •”

“An enjoyable hybrid that lends itself to relaxation and creativity. It does a nice job of mellowing me out without pulling my focus into another dimension, and is very pleasantly fragrant with notes of lavender and citrus. 

I won't buy this one often myself, but I sesh frequently with friends who do and always enjoy the blunts they roll with this strain. Definitely a positive experience.”
“Lavender Jones will sneak up on you and turn you into a G! One minutes you’re like “I’m not high” then suddenly... you feel like a gangster wearing the biggest smile”

“First Impression: Smooth, Floral Taste

Final Impression: This is what you need when you think you don't need it. Hard day at work? Stressed? Lavender Jones is what you need. It will put you down but not out. Great for zoning out and clearing anything on your mind with slight euphoria”
“One of the best tasting strains ever”
“Terrific sativa high that leaves me feeling energetic and hungry. Would definitely get this one again.”

“This strain is my jam. I’m all about the body relaxation. The terps in this make for a great night cap. 

Good for insomnia and pain. Definite couch-lock. Much more indica than sativa.”
“Good looking buds, really dense.  Very indica like effects, relaxed, dreamy, tired.  Chem taste with some flowery overtones.  Solid indica leaning hybrid with good potency.”
“Beautiful buds, incredible smell and taste... definitely one of my favorites.  Helps with my pain, and inflammation associated with crohns.  Bought a 1/2,,and I’m loving it.”

“Fragrant, beautiful tight buds. But buyer beware: as other reviewers have noted, this is NOT a good strain if you have anxiety or are otherwise prone to anxiety/paranoia. I smoked this last night and it exacerbated my anxiety so much that I was literally afraid to fall asleep because of nightmares. I was worried about people breaking into my house. Not good times. 

If you don't have chronic/severe anxiety or a histo...”
“The budtender steered me in the right direction. I almost didn’t leave Colorado because of this strain”
“Absolutely excellent for relaxation. Beautiful berry flavor, total body relaxed. Helped my wife with insomnia pass the hell out in about 20 minutes. Excellent for the price range.”
“Nice body high with a clearer head, and great for pain.  Other users may disagree, but to me it smells and tastes like Asian pear.  Good stuff.”

“I tend to rate strains very strictly. In other words, a good-to-very-good strain gets 4 stars. Five stars are reserved for the very best. Lavender Jones is very good indeed, so four stars it is.

What's really impressive is how much I like this strain under difficult circumstances. I got a gram under a rewards program when buying something else. When I examined the gram at home I discovered that it had been harvested...”

“Descendent of Casey Jones & Purple Urkle, Lavender Jones gives off effects of an indica strain with a euphoric kick from the parent, Casey Jones. A lovely, relaxed high is the result after using this flower for your medical & recreational needs.”

“Very heavy stone after first hit, Has me feeling very anxious and uplifted at comedown. I could see how it could help with add/ADHD at first but not when you start feeling anxious almost paranoid sometimes. Def a balanced hybrid, feeling both sometimes anxious  and other times couch locked”
“COVERED in crystals!  Good end of night bud, definitely some couch lock. Nice taste and really pretty buds.  good for a nice sleep.”

“Heavy Indica. More of an earthy taste. Heavy coughing experience, like the type of bud you take a hit and can feel the THC in your lungs. Got me super baked quick. Has some purple nugs and some light undertones of purple on other nugs. Would buy again 👌🏽”

“I get my Lavender Jones from The Pig N Whistle  in Denver and I love it! Their's is definitely heavy on the Purple Urkle cause it is very relaxing, but lacks the couch lock of a full indica. Wonderful daytime medication for anxiety or winding down at the end of the night! It has the most wonderful floral lavender-y taste.”
“Gets  me super high and then knocks me out.”
“One of my favorite strains. High was very mellow with a little bit of the giggles.  Buds are very dense and furry.”

“I very much enjoyed this strain. I bought an 1/8th for me and my husband, generally we vape but smoked this via bong before bed and it was a very lovely experience. Lovely smell on this one, smoked, it leaves a nice mellow melon taste in your mouth. After it hits, it is subtle, more like a hug that blossoms into love. Not a total knock down like some indicas. This one makes me relaxed, knocks out most of my hip pain ...”
“tried this one in Denver and omg it's amazing, so energetic, happy and everything just seemed wonderfull.”
“Absolutely love this strain, nice dense and colorful buds, very potent, and the aromas are amazing. All around good high”

“This strain has a strong scent of tangerines and pine. The buds are so dense that you may find it difficult to get trimmers inside. It is one of those strains that is very easy to trim. You can shear the buds easily.”

“Fantastic Indica. The genetic parents are delicious, resulting in a super yummy child. Initially the high influences the mind in a groggy"/haze like sedation. Not the heaviest body high by any means. Some people find that it doesn't support insomnia but its a great strain to employ for general relaxation and chill vibes. I'm always down to smoke this strain
column4: unless of course I want to be energized. Regardless

column3: “Smooth smoke and great high that sets in quite immediately.”
“One of the best I've had yet... Other than white dawg”
“LJ is a great smoke. If you're ever in it's presence take a toke or two, you won't be disappointed.”

“Smoked this for the first time yesterday. Picked it up at my local shop lasvegasreleaf.com during one of their sales. Great great feeling and awesome strain. I did get a soapy feeling in my mouth which beats cotton mouth everyday. Wondering if anyone else has experienced this. Felt very floaty but with a cool chill. Highly recommend it.”
“First strain I've ever tried, amazing feelings all around. It left me relaxed and uplifted”

“Picked up a pre-roll 2 pack by Flora Vega  @ Oasis here in Vegas. 
 It's got a Good laid back lift to it. Easing the nerves and smoothing out some edges. 
   Slight bummer that, the effects seem to completely cease after eating. I guess that is why it was a 2-pack.”

“This is legit one of the best strains I've tried.  I buy this as shake and make canna oil with it for medical reasons, and it was a noticeable step up from Blackwater and Blue Dream, the strains I've used for this in the past.  The reviews are correct - an initial euphoric high followed by sleepy time.  I take it with dinner and by the time bed time rolls around I'm out.”

“One of the best hybrids I have ever had. I picked up the Colorado Concentrate CO2 Oil Syringe from Lightshade on Holly. This particular syringe tests at 86.5% and it is truly a great combination of relaxation and stimulation. Great for anxiety and pain relief.”
“Felt good for relaxing just made me want to sit down and chill I really enjoyed this one would not recommend for mornings though”

“Proper dense buds,great taste and helps with my ptsd+depression. If you smoke too much a bit of couch lock does occur but nothing too major. Overall I keep coming back to this lovely strain-would recommend.”

“When smoking this everything was fine I felt super social and wasn't overly hyper and didn't have red eyes but when I went to lay down I began to get extremely paranoid and anxious. I would not recommend this to people who have bad Anxiety or get panic attacks like I do.”
“Nice and purple”

“Lavender Jones worked wonders on my anxiety. I was very relaxed and social after smoking this smooth flowery blend. I also recommend this for anyone suffering from migraines like myself...took a couple hits of this when a migraine started and it really took away a lot of the pain to the point I could function again. I'm in love with this strain!”

“Before trying this strain, I had only 2 favorites out of all the strains I've tried. Now I have 3! It gives my body a wonderful relaxing, chill as hell feeling but I have to be careful not to over indulge or else I get all panicky/ anxious. I'm always high when I wake up, which is cool if I don't have anything to do the next day. Other than that, I'm rockin with it!”
“best smoke ever for relaxing plus getting your creative mind going. love this strain and haven't found any other bud that can compare to its smooth flowery taste. all day smoke for me personally”

“Very smooth and tastes great. My gf thinks I'm crazy when I said the exhale smelled like laundry detergent 
Like clean laundry. Idk just my opinion 
Great strain to smoke after a hard day at work.
Mellows u out and I can't stop smiling. Love it”
“love it! perfect chill indica where you can still function”
“The smell & taste are amazing. Didn't take much until I was stuck watching Netflix and eating a bowl of French Toast crunch!”

“Got a joint of this strain last Monday at Native Roots in Littleton. 
Went in for an 1/8 of something good and walked out with 3 different strains in 4 pre rolled for 16 bucks, that's 2 grams for 16 bucks., pretty sweet for any budget.
I broke each  .5 gram doobie up and take a pull or three with my one hitter because that's how I role when the kid is in school. Otherwise I take a pull from my vape pen of whatever st...”
“Good vibes”

“Went to Lightshade on 6th looking for some Blue Dream, White Dawg or GG#4.  They were out of all 3, so I picked up some LJ.  Very tight nugs, w/a true Lavender taste.  This strain is a rocket ship, 1-2 bong rips and I'm blitzed.  Very energetic  high and good to clean the apt. with.”

“Real relaxing indica! I recommend this for someone trying to chill, play some video games and get ready with munchies cuz it will make you hungryyyy! Love the smooth taste and it even had me coughing a lil, I recommend this indica for a late night toke.”

“this strain was perfect for relaxing for me in concentrate form this medicine made for a relaxation of the bones and a good 45 mins of cerebral head high from the casey jones, and the taste on this thing was unlike anyrhing ive ever tasted lavender and flowers is what stands out above all else”

“Awake before dawn. Using my wax pen at low temp, I taste nothing on inhale. But then I release my hit slowly through my nose. Suddenly, I'm enjoying a grapefruit with sugar on top for breakfast. I lick my lips and tuck my self back into these starched, white, linen sheets and make love to myself as the sun comes up!”
“Nope.......not even a little if you have anxiety. Love 2 U all.”
“Ultra insanity white with purple accents. Almost impossible to see the green. Super dense trichomes, clear. Amazing high that hit instantly in the morning.”
“Chill and peaceful, especially after smoking another strain - I hit some Presidential Kush before the LJ and I'm floating.”
